mods.name: Individual Item Kits
mods.author: AgentKush
mods.description: 1396 individual item kits - craftable and raw items only! Fairly priced by complexity (5-300 credits). Organized into 73 categories with visual spacing. Search for any item!

mods.name: Agents BioLab
mods.author: AgentKush
mods.description: Adds all 10 Bio Lab Legendary weapons to the Workshop! Includes Frontier Revolver, Kinetic Rifle, Tactical Bow, Mining Armature, Biotech Maul, Heavy Flamethrower, Anti-materiel Rifle, Javelin Launcher, Slug Launcher, and Ice Mammoth Sledgehammer. All purchasable for 1000 Exotics each.

mods.name: FastProcessing All 5x
mods.author: AgentKush
mods.description: Makes ALL crafting and processing 5x faster! Covers 1723 recipes including cooking, smelting, Fabricator, Material Processor, and more. Only use ONE FastProcessing mod at a time!

mods.name: FastProcessing All 10x
mods.author: AgentKush
mods.description: Makes ALL crafting and processing 10x faster! Covers 1723 recipes including cooking, smelting, Fabricator, Material Processor, and more. Only use ONE FastProcessing mod at a time!

mods.name: FastProcessing All 15x
mods.author: AgentKush
mods.description: Makes ALL crafting and processing 15x faster! Covers 1723 recipes including cooking, smelting, Fabricator, Material Processor, and more. Only use ONE FastProcessing mod at a time!

mods.name: FastProcessing All 25x
mods.author: AgentKush
mods.description: Makes ALL crafting and processing 25x faster! Covers 1723 recipes including cooking, smelting, Fabricator, Material Processor, and more. Only use ONE FastProcessing mod at a time!

mods.name: FastProcessing Instant
mods.author: AgentKush
mods.description: Makes ALL crafting and processing INSTANT! Covers 1723 recipes including cooking, smelting, Fabricator, Material Processor, and more. Zero wait time! Only use ONE FastProcessing mod at a time!

mods.name: Indestructible Tools and Weapons
mods.author: AgentKush
mods.description: Makes all tools, weapons, armor, buildings, doors, and crafting stations virtually indestructible. Sets durability to the games maximum cap.

mods.name: No Food Spoilage
mods.author: AgentKush
mods.description: Prevents all food items and volatile substances from spoiling in your inventory. Meat, fish, vegetables, and volatile substances will last forever!

mods.name: Modular Affliction Adjuster
mods.author: AgentKush
mods.description: Comprehensive affliction adjustment - 110 modifications covering diseases, wounds, temperature, poisons, weather exposure, cave sickness, and exotic debuffs. Reduces penalties by ~50%, extends escalation times, and halves damage-over-time.

mods.name: Modular Buff Enhancer
mods.author: AgentKush
mods.description: Comprehensive buff enhancement - 239 modifications boosting tonics, drinks, bed healing, comfort bonuses, biolab inhalers, aura effects, and 156 food buffs by ~50%. Stronger positive effects across the board.

mods.name: Hidden Building Pieces
mods.author: AgentKush
mods.description: Unlocks 18 hidden diagonal and curved building piece sets for Concrete, Glass, and Clay Brick. Craft at Masonry Bench, Cement Mixer, Electric Masonry Bench, or Glassworking Bench.

mods.name: Workshop Recyclers
mods.author: AgentKush
mods.description: Adds Biofuel Recycler and Organic Residue Recycler - two new machines for recycling 299 workshop items into currency AND 1,376 crafted items back into materials. 1,677 total recipes!
